column4: does anyone know of any thing for gnome that would show my pc stats as part of my wallpaper .. set on top of my wallpaper?
has there been anything new like widgets come out for gnome or is widgets it.. and if so have widgets gotten any better than what they were a few yrs back?
there are some decent widget programs.
whats a really stable one that would give me the ability to add an active HUD of my pc's status.. i need cpu, network, ram, hdd usages if possible
